title: 2008 Six Nations Under 20s Championship
text:
The 2008 Six Nations Under 20s Championship was the first <a href="Six%20Nations%20Under%2020s%20Championship">Six Nations Under 20s Championship</a>, a <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> competition for under-20 national teams, played between February and March 2008. This was the first competition of the new under-20s tournament, following the merger of the under-19 and under-21 tournaments. England won the tournament along with the <a href="Grand%20Slam%20%28rugby%20union%29">Grand Slam</a> and <a href="Triple%20Crown%20%28rugby%20union%29">Triple Crown</a>.
Top try scorers.
Noah Cato (ENG) – 6
<a href="Leigh%20Halfpenny">Leigh Halfpenny</a> (WAL) – 3
Zagar, Bastareaud (both FRA), Strain (SCO), Stegmann, Ellis, Cox, Eves (all ENG) – 2
